com.mycompany.word_lines_count - package com.mycompany.word_lines_count
 
count(File) - Method in interface com.mycompany.word_lines_count.Counter
Generic count method
count(File) - Method in class com.mycompany.word_lines_count.LineCounter
 
count(String[]) - Method in class com.mycompany.word_lines_count.WordCountApplication
Chooses what type of counting to do A slightly custom modified implementation of the Strategy Design pattern where it chooses what type of counting to do by instantiating the appropriate counter (word or line counter) based on what arguments passed in from cmd line
count(File) - Method in class com.mycompany.word_lines_count.WordCounter
 
Counter - Interface in com.mycompany.word_lines_count
